intro: Hello! I'm Esteban Salvay Dilena, a passionate web developer with a focus on creating engaging and functional digital experiences. With two years of experience in the industry, I've had the privilege of working on a variety of challenging projects that have allowed me to develop solid skills in various areas of web development.
develop: My main focus is on creating websites and web applications that are not only visually appealing, but also intuitive and easy to use. I'm excited about the opportunity to work on exciting and challenging projects and look forward to using my skills and experience to bring your ideas to life in the digital world.
greetings: Thank you for taking the time to meet me!
